verses.verse: It <S%H4438>happened,<s%> when the kingdom of <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> was <S%H3559>established,<s%> and he was <S%H2393>strong,<s%> that he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all Israel with <S%H3478>him.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil,<s%> because he <S%H3559>didn't<s%> set his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H29>Abijah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
